author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Vanity cabinet shutoff valve tips…I deburred the inside & outside of the pipe and marked the depth. My SharkBite angle stops have tube liners for PEX but I keep them in for copper. I slide the valve up to the required depth so the o-ring makes a watertight seal. These valves are quick to install and great for tight spots 🔥#plumbing #sharkbiteplumbing #bathroomrenovation #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Vanity Cabinet Shutoff Valve Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
